name: Juke Run Hero
description:
1 Player control: J,K,L

2 Players controls: A,S,D  & J,K,L

3 Players controls: Q,W,E - Z,X,C - I,O,P - B,N,M

Controls:

  1. J - Slide
  2. K - Jump
  3. L - Roll
  4. Escape - Pause

Notes:

Combining each inputs (e.g. J->K) will create unique movements that could be used to avoid chained hazards.

Holding M+L+G in the menu will put you in special mode ;)
